author: automotivetestingtechnologyinternational.com
title: Latest News : Automotive Testing Technology International
text:
SHOW NEWS: New high performance miniature pressure sensor
PMC Engineering at booth 9004 is highlighting its ATM.mini pressure transmitter, which provides a two-wire, 4-20mA or 0.5-4.5Vdc analog output within a lightweight housing of <0.69in diameter. Ranges are available from 0-15 to 0-1500 psi gauge or absolute.
The ATM.mini offers accuracies of <0.05% FS including linearity, hysteresis, repeatability, zero and span setting, and long term stability of <0.1% FS/year. Modular construction provides flexibility in the selection of both process and electrical connectors to suit different applications. This new transmitter is designed for use in a wide range of development, prototype and production testing applications.
